1. Archiving a file 
     $ tar -cvf filename.tar foldername/location  
     `-c` create  
     `-v` verbos output  
     `-f` set a filename/filelocation
  2. Compressing a file
    a. To compress a file: 
     $ gzip filename.tar

    b. Show the file:

     $ ls
  3. Extracting a compressed file
    To unzip and extract a file: 
    $ tar -xzvf filename.tar.gz
